mapper.select:
select res.RESOURCE_ID resourceId,res.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName,res.AUTHOR author, res.THUMB_PATH thumbPath,res.VIEW_CNT viewCnt,sub.SUBJECT_NAME subjectName, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.CLASSLEVEL_NAME ORDER BY cl.SORT ASC SEPARATOR '/') classlevelName from resource res left join subject sub on res.SUBJECT_ID = sub.SUBJECT_ID JOIN resource_r_classlevel rrc ON res.RESOURCE_ID=rrc.RESOURCE_ID JOIN classlevel cl ON rrc.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cl.CLASSLEVEL_ID where res.LIVING_FLAG = 'N' and res.DELETE_FLAG='N'
and res.RESOURCE_ID in (select rrcl.RESOURCE_ID from resource_r_classlevel rrcl,classlevel cll where rrcl.CLASSLEVEL_ID=cll.CLASSLEVEL_ID and cll.CLASSLEVEL_NAME = #{map.classlevelName})
and res.SUBJECT_ID in (SELECT sj.SUBJECT_ID FROM subject sj WHERE sj.SUBJECT_NAME = #{map.subjectName})
and (res.RESOURCE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{map.resourceNameKey},'%') ESCAPE '/' or res.AUTHOR like CONCAT('%',#{map.resourceNameKey},'%') ESCAPE '/')
GROUP BY res.RESOURCE_ID
order by res.CREATE_TIME ${map.orderType}
order by res.VIEW_CNT ${map.orderType}
order by res.CREATE_TIME desc
